General.Name: Henan Rebecca Hair Products Co Ltd
General.Description: Henan Rebecca Hair Products Co., Ltd. engages in production and sale of hair products. It offers craft and chemical fiber clockwork, human hair wig, chemical fiber wig, teaching head, fiber hair, etc. under the Rebecca, Sleek, JOEDIR, NOBLE, MAGIC, and QVR brands. The company sells its products through 188 directly-operated stores and franchised stores in China. Henan Rebecca Hair Products Co., Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is based in Xuchang, China.
